select t1.T_EMAIL, t1.CRCT_NO, t1.CRCT_STAT, t2.NAME, t2.EMAIL from RE_CRCT as t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBS as t2 on t1.T_EMAIL = t2.EMAIL where t2.AUTH = 1 and t1.CRCT_STAT=0 order by CRCT_NO desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}

select t1.T_EMAIL, t1.CRCT_NO, t1.CRCT_STAT, t2.NAME, t2.EMAIL from RE_CRCT as t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBS as t2 on t1.T_EMAIL = t2.EMAIL where t2.AUTH = 1 and t1.CRCT_STAT=1 order by CRCT_NO desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
